title: "A baby llama has possibly been stolen from Maine farm"
excerpt: "Mainers should be on the lookout for a baby llama that was possibly stolen from a farm in Acton. Acton Animal Control Officer Jim Driscoll was notified Sunday about a possibly stolen llama. He is asking farmers and neighbors in the area of Foxes Ridge and County roads to look out for the animal."
